title: Trump Campaign Makes Texas Push Ahead of President’s Visit
text:
SAN ANTONIO—President Trump’s campaign is taking an oversize swing through Texas this week, with the president, his son and campaign manager hitting the trail as they seek to hold the traditionally Republican state next year.

The president drops into Texas at a challenging moment for his presidency, facing an impeachment inquiry in the Democratic House over his dealings with Ukraine and bipartisan criticism that he triggered Middle East chaos by withdrawing U.S. troops from northern Syria. His visit to the Lone Star State...
description: President Trump’s campaign is taking an oversize swing through Texas this week, with the president, his son and campaign manager hitting the trail as they seek to hold the traditionally Republican state next year.
